posts.name: The Dog House
posts.note: No-frills, cash-only eatery with counter seating, offering hot dogs, burgers, pizza and cheesesteaks.

posts.name: Go Fish!
posts.note: Casual 40-seat restaurant with British theme featuring fish 'n' chips, toffee pudding and other eats.

posts.name: Hopkins Farm Creamery
posts.note: Ice cream made with local ingredients and sold from walk-up windows on a working dairy farm.
